alert.note: Alert for Central Penobscot; Central Piscataquis; Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Northwest Aroostook; Southeast Aroostook; Southern Penobscot; Southern Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 30 at 3:46AM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow showers will affect southeastern Piscataquis...eastern Aroostook and Penobscot Counties... At 344 AM EDT...An area of heavy snow showers was along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Frenchville to Katahdin Woods and Waters National Monument to near Waterville...and moving northeast AT 30 MPH. Locations impacted include... Bangor, Presque Isle, Caribou, Old Town, Millinocket, Dover-Foxcroft, Fort Kent, Madawaska, Dexter, Newport, Limestone, Van Buren, Guilford, Howland, Patten, Eagle Lake, Brownville Junction, Portage, Mount Katahdin and Hampden. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 between mile markers 157 and 178, and between mile markers 208 and 285. US Highway 1 between Presque Isle and Caribou, and between Grand Isle and Frenchville. State Highway 11 between Newport and Wallagrass. State Highway 9 between Dixmont and Newburgh. * Winds of up to 25 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow showers. * Snowfall accumulation of up to one inch is expected with this area of heavy snow showers. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
